description:
Mr. Handa invites Polar Bear out to lunch, while Panda and Penguin discover more about Sasako.   Panda Mama has much to learn when it comes to all-
you-can-stuff and all-you-can-eat situations.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Handa-san no Soudan / Panda Mama no Nichijou
Mr. Handa`s Discussion / Panda Mama`s Daily Life
半田さんの相談 / パンダママの日常
